original_text: Also take twice the amount of money with you. You must give back the money that they put back into your bags last time. It may have been a mistake.
korean_text: 너희 손에 갑절의 돈을 가지고 너희 자루 아귀에 도로 넣어져 있던 그 돈을 다시 가지고 가라 혹 잘못이 있었을까 두렵도다

sentences.original_text: Also take twice the amount of money with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 돈을 두 배로 가지고 가라.

sentences.original_text: You must give back the money
that they put back into your bags last time.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 지난번에 너희 가방에 넣어준 돈을.

sentences.original_text: It may have been a mistake.
